com.nestlabs.sdk

Class SmokeCOAlarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestlabs.sdk.Device
      • com.nestlabs.sdk.SmokeCOAlarm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public final class SmokeCOAlarm
extends Device
implements Parcelable
    SmokeCOAlarm represents and contains all properties of a Nest smoke+CO alarm device.

      • getUIColorState

        public String getUIColorState()
        Returns the device status by color in the Nest app UI. It is an aggregate condition for battery+smoke+co states, and reflects the actual color indicators displayed in the Nest app.

        Values: "gray", "green", "yellow", "red"

        Returns:
        the device status by color in the Nest app UI.
